snippet: The State of Utah paid Goldman Sachs after the firm paid preschool costs for pupils who had been expected to need special education services.
abstract: Goldman Sachs reaps income from novel social impact bond following success of related kindergarten students in Utah; bonds are seen as tool that people and institutions can feel good about.
lead_paragraph: The State of Utah paid Goldman Sachs after the firm paid preschool costs for pupils who had been expected to need special education services.

headline.main: For Goldman, Success in Social Impact Bond That Aids Schoolchildren
headline.print_headline: For Goldman, Success in Social Impact Bond That Aids Schoolchildren
